data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Chin.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chin, Myanmar (Burma)
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 478,700 people living in Chin, Myanmar (Burma). Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Chin, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, help the 23,319 believers in Chin to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 455,381 lost friends and neighbors.
Jesus, I pray that all the Barua people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Barua people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Barua people is yours.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Chin. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Chin you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chin, Myanmar (Burma) has a population of 478,700.

We estimate Chin has 23,319 people who might know Jesus, 15,754 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 439,627 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 20 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 455,381 lost in Chin that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
